name: yappify
title: yappify
description: Voice-to-text transcription using Whisper.cpp. Yap into your terminal with on-device AI.
author: sumeyacodes

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Whisper Model
preferences.description: Choose whisper model (larger = better quality, slower)

scripts.build:addon: (test -f native/addon.node || (cd whisper.cpp/examples/addon.node && npm install && cd ../.. && npx cmake-js compile -T addon.node -B Release && mkdir -p ../native && cp build/Release/addon.node.node ../native/addon.node)) && mkdir -p assets && cp native/addon.node assets/addon.node
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish to npm.

If you did intend to publish to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`pnpm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish to the Raycast Store instead, use \`pnpm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
